name: Factory Dealings
description:
Factory Dealings is an arcade game where you'll have to give items for injured robots, and fast, or else they will explode and die a cruel death.

Controls:

W, A, S, D to move

E to pick up and deliver items

ESC to open the menu

All assets were done by our 3 member team,

André Cardoso

João Silva

Rafael Cavalinhos

except the font.
